channel.title: Patches won't go live (EDIT: Resolved now)
channel.description: Hi, I recently had to reinstall Windows and since doing so patches won't go live, everytime I try the error in the screenshot shows up and the axo disconnects. Have tried downloading/reinstalling both the runtime and .msi files several times (including the java options) but no luck. Never had any issues before the reinstall so don't know why it's not working now. I'm running Windows 10 Pro 64-bit (I saved the runtime folder to Program Files (x86) and tried the 32-bit folder one time just in case). Thanks in advance! Kieran EDIT: I also noticed an issue with Command Prompt closing as soon as I tried to open it, followed this link to get cmd prompt working and patches go live now: https://www.techsupportforum.com/threads/windows-10-command-prompt-closes-immediately.1223026/page-2

item.title: Patches won't go live (EDIT: Resolved now)
item.dc:creator: @KIERANSAVAGE93 Kieran Savage
item.description:
@KIERANSAVAGE93 wrote:

Hi, I recently had to reinstall Windows and since doing so patches won't go live, everytime I try the error in the screenshot shows up and the axo disconnects.
Have tried downloading/reinstalling both the runtime and .msi files several times (including the java options) but no luck.
Never had any issues before the reinstall so don't know why it's not working now.
I'm running Windows 10 Pro 64-bit (I saved the runtime folder to Program Files (x86) and tried the 32-bit folder one time just in case).

Thanks in advance!
Kieran

EDIT: I also noticed an issue with Command Prompt closing as soon as I tried to open it, followed this link to get cmd prompt working and patches go live now: https://www.techsupportforum.com/threads/windows-10-command-prompt-closes-immediately.1223026/page-2

Screenshot (2).png1920x1080 173 KB

Read full topic
item.source: Patches won't go live (EDIT: Resolved now)
